walletSignInStep.label: Welcome!
walletSignInStep.title: Wallet Sign-in
walletSignInStep.description: Your available Wallets are listed here below. Click one to connect the desired wallet and Sign in

paymentPlanStep.label: Payment Plan
paymentPlanStep.title: Choose A Tier
paymentPlanStep.description: Select one of the tiers according to the API calls. You can renew the plan from you dashboard each month.

projectInfoStep.title: Project Info
projectInfoStep.description: Define your Statur Project name and add a short description for users to read. You cannot change this data later.

brandingStep.title: Branding
brandingStep.description: Pick a color from the palette below. You can use the top right switch to check both light and dark modes

createAccountStep.label: Welcome Administrator!
createAccountStep.title: Create Account
createAccountStep.description: Create your public account name and choose an avatar.

processingTransactionStep.label: Processing transaction...
processingTransactionStep.title: Creating Account
processingTransactionStep.description: Please bear with us, you’ll be redirected soon.

createAccountSuccessStep.label: Account Ready for:
createAccountSuccessStep.description: Click the button below to join the project, access the administration panel and finalize the project setup

metricFields.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. dashboardLayout.description: If you want a leaderboard sidebar, choose the first option and define which of the Metric Fields will be used to rank your top 10 users. If you only need a list of users, without a static sidebar top rank leaderboard, opt for the second option.

leaderboardTrackingField.title: Leaderboard tracking field
leaderboardTrackingField.description: Define which of your tracking Field will be used to set-up the leaderboard of the top 10 accounts

accountDefaultSorting.title: Accounts default sorting
accountDefaultSorting.description: Define which of your tracking Field will be used to sort the accounts on the dashboard by default

profilesLayout.label: Enable User Profile Page
profilesLayout.description: If you wish so, you can generate user profile pages. Use this settings screen to define which metric fields to show on this pages, their order, and which infographic style use to display each metric field.

badges.description: Create badges to assign to your users. Tie each badge to a metric achievement,

stepName.title: Badge Name
stepName.description: To create your customized badge, start with a name to describe it’s function

stepDescription.title: Description
stepDescription.description: Please, add more information about this badge meaning and functionalities.

stepIcon.title: Badge Icon
stepIcon.description: Select the badge icon from this placeholders available (image for example use only, you can add yours in the code)

stepMechanics.title: Mechanics
stepMechanics.description: Time to create the mechanics of the badge, choose one of the tracking fields and a value to reach.
stepMechanics.equalsOrMore: Equals or more then “Value to reach”
stepMechanics.equalsOrLess: Equals or less then “Value to reach”

apiAndPayment.description: Monitor your API daily calls and manage or renew your payment plan

description.prefix: Please, finalize the app configuration in the administration panel.

missingKeys.title: Missing Keys
missingKeys.description: It seems like the Keys are not present in the project code. Please fix the issue to proceed

databaseError.title: Database Error
databaseError.description: It seems like there is a problem connecting with your database. Please fix the issue to proceed
